title: Diary of Steve the Noob 14 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: This Minecraft diary is over 13,000 words long and has 26 pictures to accompany the entries. *Sad Face* Cindy left the village to go live with Wanda... *Happy Face* Steve obtained a healing potion. He is going to fix his leg! Woohoo! *Confused Face* I've forgotten what else happens in this volume. Read Steve the Noob #14 today to find out what happens next. This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. author: Steve the Noob
